thread.title: Manchester City star Kevin De Bruyne produces insane keppy-uppy basketball trick shot from his own half
thread.title_full: Manchester City star Kevin De Bruyne produces insane keppy-uppy basketball trick shot from his own half

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Manchester City star Kevin De Bruyne produces insane keppy-uppy basketball trick shot from his own half
text:
Thanks to Duse Magazine , we get to see the Manchester City midfielder nail an unbelievable keepy-uppy basketball shot from deep within his own half. "No way, not from there..." (Photo: YouTube/DUSE) 
The 25-year-old starts off by comfortably performing keepy-uppies with the ball. Out of nowhere, the Belgium star puts his foot through the ball sending it towards the opposite hoop. "NO" (Photo: YouTube/DUSE) 
The ball sails through the rim hitting just net. 
And the video is even better with Seven Nation Army dropping as the ball passes through the hoop for an epic three-pointer. poll loading Is this the best long-range trick shot you've ever seen? 500+ VOTES SO FAR BUT CRISTIANO RONALDO CAN DO BETTER LONG-RANGE TRICK SHOTS, BRO Like us on Facebook
